mapper.sql: logID, userID, projectID, datachange_createtime, datachange_lasttime, amount
mapper.select: select projectID from log where userID=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by projectID
mapper.insert: insert into log (logID, userID, projectID, datachange_createtime, datachange_lasttime, amount) values (#{logid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{datachangeCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{datachangeLasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
